TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit HierarchicalDataSourceDesigner extends System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner implements class System.Web.UI.Design.IHierarchicalDataSourceDesigner

Docs.summary: Provides design-time support in a visual designer for the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The HierarchicalDataSourceDesigner class is a base class for deriving your own data source designer for a custom data source control derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceControl> class. Other classes that derive from HierarchicalDataSourceDesigner are <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDataSourceDesigner> and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SiteMapDataSourceDesigner>.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
Gets the action list collection for the control designer.
Docs.value: A object that contains the items for the control designer.

Docs.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IHierarchicalDataSourceDesigner.Configure%2A> method can be called.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A design host, such as [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/add/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)], uses this property to determine whether to show a **Configure** command in the Smart-Tag menu in design view.

Docs.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IHierarchicalDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema%2A> method can be called.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A design host, such as [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/add/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)], uses this property to determine whether to show a **Refresh Schema** command in the Smart-Tag menu in design view.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Configure() cil managed

Docs.summary: Launches the configuration wizard for the underlying data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The Configure method is not supported in the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.HierarchicalDataSourceDesigner> class.

Docs.summary: Occurs when any property of the associated data source changes.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance string GetDesignTimeHtml() cil managed

Docs.summary: Gets the HTML markup that is used to represent the control at design time.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerHierarchicalDataSourceView GetView(string viewPath) cil managed

Docs.param: The unique path to the block of data to use in creating the view.
Docs.summary: Gets the named data source view associated with the data source control.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnDataSourceChanged(class System.EventArgs e) cil managed

Docs.param: An <xref:System.EventArgs> object provided by the calling object.
Docs.summary: Raises the event when the properties of the data source have changed and the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.HierarchicalDataSourceDesigner.SuppressingDataSourceEvents%2A> property value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks The OnDataSourceChanged method notifies the designer of each control bound to the associated data source to refresh its control in the design host. This method can be suppressed with the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.HierarchicalDataSourceDesigner.SuppressDataSourceEvents%2A> method, or by calling the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.HierarchicalDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema%2A> method with an argument of `false`.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnSchemaRefreshed(class System.EventArgs e) cil managed

Docs.summary: Raises the event when the schema of the data source has changed and the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.HierarchicalDataSourceDesigner.SuppressingDataSourceEvents%2A> property value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks This method notifies the designers of each control bound to the associated data source that the fields in the schema have changed. This method can be suppressed with the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.HierarchicalDataSourceDesigner.SuppressDataSourceEvents%2A> method, or by calling the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.HierarchicalDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema%2A> method with an argument of `true`.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void RefreshSchema(bool preferSilent) cil managed

Docs.param: This parameter is not used in this implementation. However, it should be supported in derived classes.
Docs.summary: Refreshes the schema of the data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This method is not supported in this class, but is implemented in derived classes, such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDataSourceDesigner> class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void ResumeDataSourceEvents() cil managed

Docs.summary: Restores data source events after they have been suppressed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Data source events can be suppressed by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.HierarchicalDataSourceDesigner.SuppressingDataSourceEvents%2A> property to `false`, or by calling the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.HierarchicalDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema%2A> method with an argument of `true`.

Docs.summary: Occurs after the schema has been refreshed.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void SuppressDataSourceEvents() cil managed

Docs.summary: Postpones all data source events until after the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.HierarchicalDataSourceDesigner.ResumeDataSourceEvents%2A> method is called.
Indicates whether data source events have been disabled.
Docs.value: if the or event has been disabled; otherwise, .
